item.title: Clorox has 'found a bottom,' Morgan Stanley's Aaron Dunn says
item.description: The co-head of value equity at Morgan Stanley Investment Management joined CNBC's "Power Check" to give his bullish take on a couple stocks.

item.title: Could Trump make Intel great again? Bernstein has some doubts
item.description: Uncle Sam buying an equity stake in Intel is unlikely to solve the chipmaker's underlying problems, according to Bernstein.

item.title: Charts suggest this online gambling stock is headed back to a new high, says Carter Worth
item.description: The technical analyst draws DraftKings four different ways.

item.title: These stocks reporting earnings next week have a history of topping analysts' estimates
item.description: CNBC Pro screened data from Bespoke Investment Group for companies due to report next week that have a history of beating earnings expectations and th...

item.title: HSBC downgrades Cisco, says further gains will be harder to come by
item.description: The bank downgraded the network infrastructure stock to hold in a Thursday note.
